Type.Name: VButtonBox

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VButtonBox extends Gtk.ButtonBox

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A button box should be used to provide a consistent layout of buttons throughout your application. This box provides a way of laying out buttons vertically.

remarks.para: The layout of buttons in this type of box is determined by the box's .
Methods for manipulating button boxes are provided in the super classes, and .

Docs.summary: The normal way to construct a vertical button box

remarks.para: This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.
